Newton.Lenoir Dow House: The Lenoir Dow House is a historic house at 215 Adams Street in Waltham, Massachusetts. The 2-1/2 story wood frame house was built in 1988, during the building boom of the 1880s on Waltham's south side. Built to house workers at the Waltham Watch Company, the house is a well-preserved Queen Anne Victorian, with an asymmetrical facade, hip roof topped by iron cresting, and a porch with ornate woodwork.
